name: Super Scratch Party
description:
*welcome to my Mario Party re-make!!!! have fun with tons of mini-games and boards to play on, plus some of my past characters from some of my other games. enjoy, i worked very hard on this and i hope you like it :)

⭐FEATURES:

- over 40 mini-games!!!!

- 4 characters to choose from

- different minigame options (all, 4 player, team, 1 v 3, and chance)

- a "duel" mode for two players

- lots of different spaces that do lots of different stuff

- 9 different and original maps

- 4 different minigame types (4 player, 2 v 2, 1 v 3, and battle)

- a minigame mode with cool side games

- differently colored mini-games do different things

- a practice option to git guud at the mini-games

- board game-play and partially skilled and partially luck based game-play

- lots of older Mario Party music i guess for nostalgia

- the fact that this took me over 4 months to make and that this is my most advanced project yet :)

- and soooo much more!!!!

SPECIAL THANKS:

- thanks to @Ciaran33X33 for his Mario Party game which helped with the sounds and music :)

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/277985174/

- also thanks to Mario Parties 3 and 5 for inspiration
